db:abstract.db:para: The Weather Info example shows how to use the user's current position to retrieve local content from a web service in a C++ plugin for QML.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = weatherinfo
QT += core network positioning qml quick
SOURCES += main.cpp \ appmodel.cpp
OTHER_FILES += weatherinfo.qml \ components/WeatherIcon.qml \ components/ForecastIcon.qml \ components/BigForecastIcon.qml \ icons/*
RESOURCES += weatherinfo.qrc
HEADERS += appmodel.h
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/positioning/weatherinfo INSTALLS += target
